venue.name: The Willimantic Brewing Co./Main Street Caf√©

item.description:
***Voted Best Brew Pub In CT*** If You Like Fresh Beer & Enjoy Good Food... The Willimantic Brewing Co./Main Street Café is a living landmark restaurant and pub brewery located in Willimantic, in the heart of rural northeastern Connecticut.

Fresh Beer & a Whole Lot More... They brew over a dozen different handcrafted styles of beer each month. In addition to their own beers, they have over 20 different craft microbrews on tap, many from New England. They also serve a variety of bottled domestic and imported beers, cocktails and a changing wine list.

Unique Atmosphere... They're housed in an historic granite and limestone 1909 U.S. Post Office Building. When used as a post office, the pub was the customer lobby and the private dining room housed the postmaster‘s office. The dining room, from where you can view the 7 barrel brewery, was the post office work room.

Extensive Menu... The post office-themed menu is overflowing with mouth watering selections, featuring over 100 items. From award-winning wings to steaks, pasta, seafood, burgers and salads, there is sure to be something to please.

So come on over and join us...have a drink...have a bite...have a blast!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri, Mike, or the Meetup sign...cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: We're Going Postal @ The Willimantic Brewing Company!
